title: 你偏爱哪种类型的RPG服务器？
author: 华南。
txt_content:
本帖最后由 mihu721 于 2019-7-23 16:47 编辑 

我的世界日益发展，服务器的类型也越来越多，作为我的世界的一员，你更偏爱哪种类型呢？

replies.author: 空桑i了
replies.txt_content: 为什么只有RPG型emmm

replies.author: yourh
replies.txt_content: 个人是比较喜欢武侠风RPG~~~

replies.author: 我真狂
replies.txt_content: 超变态rpg

replies.author: zhong_li
replies.txt_content: 我喜欢武侠的好一点 但是我投错了

replies.author: 银风000
replies.txt_content: 生存类的，并不喜欢RPG型..............

replies.author: 梦江南
replies.txt_content: 一刀999风

replies.author: 733446256www
replies.txt_content: eeeeeeeeeeeeee

replies.author: hhehhehhe
replies.txt_content: 喜欢很有特色的RPG

replies.author: Sinbad_Official
replies.txt_content: 国内商业服不关多好玩都不可能碰

replies.author: 98ss
replies.txt_content: 只要特色够新颖，哪种类型rpg会不引人注目呢？

replies.author: LoveLollipop
replies.txt_content: 当然是纯净生存的RPG

replies.author: 小cheng
replies.txt_content: lz是要做rpg服吧！我觉得自由rpg向很好！

replies.author: Min_DeR
replies.txt_content: 能肝就能玩的那种最好了

replies.author: S1lv3rw1n9
replies.txt_content: 我可能思想有·过时,我现在只喜欢那种刷副本的,技能比较爽的RPGawa

replies.author: Тιмγα姬
replies.txt_content: 贪玩蓝月，请
RPG至少要让玩家有目标，不是单纯的打怪，那样就太无聊了。所以有特色的RPG比较好

replies.author: smile久伴
replies.txt_content: 西方类的MMORPG 比如WOW那种的
可以肝的rpg

replies.author: 快乐小方
replies.txt_content:
panj 发表于 2019-7-23 16:55
一刀999风
一刀999带我一个

replies.author: haoli133609
replies.txt_content: 我比较喜欢武侠风的rpg服务器

replies.author: 黑贞
replies.txt_content: 有生存元素的

replies.author: fjwr123
replies.txt_content: 个人喜欢偏网游类型的rpg，和几个朋友一起玩比较爽

replies.author: 妹妹大人
replies.txt_content: 我喜欢我自己的rpg服务器

replies.author: dikds123
replies.txt_content: 对一些武侠风RPG服务器根本没兴趣。。。但是对于一些时空风还是很感兴趣的

replies.author: dikds123
replies.txt_content:
绫岚_ 发表于 2019-7-23 16:45
为什么只有RPG型emmm
当你打怪爆出个低概率神器的时候你的心情是有多么愉悦

replies.author: XY__MengXing
replies.txt_content: 不怎么玩rpg的服务器

replies.author: FTCpear
replies.txt_content: 日常养老rpg
